title: While We Watched (Documentary on NDTV's Ravish Kumar by Vinay Shukla) FULL MOVIE
selftext: Did anyone watch this? I found it very strong and quite nice. I loved it how the director used "cake" which is a symbol of celebration and happiness to show downfall.
comments: Great documentary!!!, a timestamp of how the news Channel eroded in india.
